meanings.definition: A man who is excessively concerned with his clothes and appearance.
meanings.sent1: The dandies in the city always wear fancy suits.
meanings.sent2: She spotted a group of dandies shopping for stylish hats.
meanings.sent3: The dandies at the party were comparing their shiny shoes.
meanings.sent4: His wardrobe was a treasure trove of dandies waiting to be worn.
meanings.sent5: The dandies strutted down the street, turning heads with their outfits.

meanings.sent1: Look at those dandies over there, all dressed up for the event.
meanings.sent2: The shop displayed various dandies in the window.
meanings.sent3: The dandies on the shelf seemed to be posing for a fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with colorful dandies, each with its unique style.
meanings.sent5: She collected vintage dandies as a hobby, admiring their craftsmanship.
